## introduction 
 GEDI is a full waveform LiDAR instrument launched December 5th, 2018

- highest resolution and densest sampling of any lidar ever put into orbit

- can compute four vegetation structure matrics like surface topography, canopy height, canopy cover, and vertical structure





```{r}
#load libraries
library(rGEDI)
library(sf)
library(sp)
library(leaflet)
library(rasterVis)
library(viridis)
library(dplyr)
library(rgdal)
library(ggplot2)
```
